metadata.feature_description: Track and manage content revisions with version history and rollback capabilities

steps.action: Logged in as SuperUser and navigated to Publisher Post Editor
steps.expected: Find a 'Revision History' option in the Post Editor interface
steps.actual: No 'Revision History' UI element found in the Post Editor. Explored post editor sidebar, edit panels, and all available options but could not locate revision history feature.

steps.action: Searched through Persona Bar menus including Content, Pages, and Settings
steps.expected: Find revision history access point somewhere in the Persona Bar
steps.actual: Found Page/File Versioning settings enabled in Site Settings > Site Behavior > More, but no UI to view revision history for Publisher posts

steps.action: Checked Content Library for version history capabilities
steps.expected: Find version history for content items
steps.actual: Content Library was empty and does not appear to be connected to Publisher post revisions

issues: No 'Revision History' UI element found in the Publisher Post Editor as specified in feature description (UI Location: Post Editor > Revision History)

steps.action: Attempted to locate revision comparison feature
steps.expected: Find UI to compare different revisions of a post
steps.actual: Could not test - Revision History UI not accessible in Post Editor

issues: Cannot test revision comparison - no Revision History UI found

steps.expected: Find UI to rollback to a previous revision
steps.actual: Could not test - Revision History UI not accessible in Post Editor

issues: Cannot test rollback - no Revision History UI found

steps.action: Attempted to verify if editing creates new revisions
steps.expected: Edit a post and see a new revision created in revision history
steps.actual: Could not verify revision creation - no Revision History UI accessible to view created revisions

issues: Cannot verify revision creation - no Revision History UI found

steps.action: Attempted to locate revision deletion functionality
steps.expected: Find UI to delete old revisions
steps.actual: Could not test - Revision History UI not accessible in Post Editor

issues: Cannot test revision deletion - no Revision History UI found

steps.action: Attempted to locate revision author tracking
steps.expected: Find UI showing who made each revision
steps.actual: Could not test - Revision History UI not accessible in Post Editor

issues: Cannot test author tracking - no Revision History UI found

steps.actual: Could not test - Revision History UI not accessible in Post Editor

issues: Cannot test revision numbering - no Revision History UI found

steps.expected: Find UI showing timestamps for each revision
steps.actual: Could not test - Revision History UI not accessible in Post Editor

issues: Cannot test timestamps - no Revision History UI found

observations: Code suggests Revision Management feature exists: RevisionManager.cs found in Publisher module at Components/Integration/RevisionManager.cs
RevisionManager.cs integrates with Evoq.Revisions library which provides backend capabilities for: GetAllChangesets, Compare revisions, Rollback, HardDelete, GetLatestRevision, StateTransition
Evoq.Revisions library located at Dnn.Evoq.Content/Evoq Enterprise/Libraries/Revisions/ contains full revision tracking system with entities like Revision, RevisionCompare, RevisionState
Site-level Page Versioning is enabled (ON) with max 10 versions in Settings > Site Behavior > More
Site-level File Versioning is enabled (ON) with max 10 versions
NO UI element found for 'Revision History' in Publisher Post Editor as specified in feature description (UI Location: Post Editor > Revision History)
Publisher Post Editor contains: Title field, Description/Body, Image upload, Edit Post Details panel, Post Author panel, but no Revision History panel
Content Library does not appear to contain Publisher post revisions
The revision management functionality appears to be backend-only with no exposed UI in the current Publisher module implementation
